name: svg-spacing
title: SVG Rectangle Spacing
description: Generate and copy SVG rectangles for spacing references.
author: connorforsyth

commands.name: index
commands.title: Create SVG Rectangle
commands.description: Create SVG Rectangle based on pixel values.

commands.name: grid
commands.title: Copy SVG Spacing Reference
commands.description: Copy selectable SVGs at different sizes, based on an 8px grid system.
